definitions.name: addEtorProcessingTag
definitions.description: Adds ETOR processing tag to all messages

definitions.name: convertToOmlOrder
definitions.description: Converts an ORM order to OML

definitions.name: addContactSectionToPatientResource
definitions.description: Adds mother's contact section to patient in OML Order

definitions.name: ucsdOruUpdateReceivingFacilityWithOrderingFacilityIdentifier
definitions.description: Updates UCSD ORU Receiving Facility (MSH-6) to value in ORC-21.10 and remove Universal Id (MSH-6.2) and Universal Id Type (MSH-6.3).

definitions.name: ucsdOruUpdateSendingFacilityNamespace
definitions.description: Updates UCSD ORU Sending Facility's Namespace Id (MSH-4) to 'CDPH'. It also removes Universal Id (MSH-4.2) and Universal Id Type (MSH-4.3).

definitions.name: ucsdOruUpdateReceivingApplicationNamespace
definitions.description: Updates UCSD ORU Receiving Application's Namespace Id (MSH-5.1) to 'EPIC'. It also removes Universal Id (MSH-5.2) and Universal Id Type (MSH-5.3)

definitions.name: ucsdOruRemoveMessageTypeStructure
definitions.description: Removes UCSD ORU Message Structure (MSH-9.3) from the Message Type (MSH-9)

definitions.name: ucsdOruSwapPlacerOrderAndGroupNumbers
definitions.description: Swaps UCSD ORU's Placer Order Number (ORC-2) and Placer Group Number (ORC-4). It also update OBR-2 with the original value for ORC-4

definitions.name: ucsdOruRemovePatientIdentifiers
definitions.description: Removes UCSD ORU Assigning Authority (PID-3.4) and Identifier Type Code (PID-3.5) from Patient Identifier List (PID-3)

definitions.name: ucsdOruRemovePatientNameTypeCode
definitions.description: Removes UCSD ORU Name Type Code (PID-5.7) from Patient Name (PID-5)

definitions.name: ucsdOruRemoveObservationRequests
definitions.description: Removes all OBRs from an UCSD ORU message except for the OBR with value '54089-8' in OBR-4.1. All OBXs are attached to the sole remaining OBR

definitions.name: laOchsnerOruRemoveObservationRequests
definitions.description: Removes all OBRs from an LA Ochsner ORU message except for the OBR with value '54089-8' in OBR-4.1. All OBXs are attached to the sole remaining OBR

definitions.name: ucsdOruUpdateUniversalServiceIdentifier
definitions.description: Overrides the values of Name of Coding System (OBR-4.3) and Alternate Identifier (OBR-4.4) in Universal Type Code (OBR-4)

definitions.name: ucsdOruMapLocalObservationCodes
definitions.description: Maps local observation codes in OBX-3.4/5/6 to LOINC/PLT codes in OBX-3.1/2/3

99717-32.display: X-linked Adrenoleukodystrophy (X- ALD) newborn screen interpretation

99717-33.display: X-linked Adrenoleukodystrophy (X- ALD) newborn screening comment-discussion

99717-34.display: ABCD1 gene mutation found [Identifier] in DBS by Sequencing

99717-35.display: CFTR gene mutation found [Interpretation] in DBS by Sequencing

99717-36.display: CFTR gene variant found [Identifier] in DBS by Sequencing comments/discussion

99717-44.display: IDUA gene variant analysis in DBS by Sequencing comments/discussion

99717-46.display: GAA gene variant analysis in DBS by Sequencing comments/discussion

99717-47.display: GAA gene mutation found [Identifier] in DBS by Sequencing

99717-48.display: IDUA gene mutations found [Identifier] in DBS by Sequencing

99717-49.display: IDS gene full mutation analysis in Blood or Tissue by Sequencing

99717-50.display: IDS gene mutations found [Identifier] in Dried Bloodspot by Molecular genetics method

99717-60.display: SMN1 exon 7 deletion analysis in DBS by Sequencing

definitions.name: ucsdOruCopyOrcOrderProviderToObrOrderProvider
definitions.description: Copies the value from ORC12 and uses this value to replace the value in OBR16

definitions.name: ucsdOruRemoveAccessionNumberObservation
definitions.description: Remove Observations for UCSD ORUs when their OBX-3.4 value is '99717-5' and OBX-3.6 is 'L'
